docs.text: About Me I am an associate professor in University of Electronic Science and Technology of China ( UESTC ), Chengdu, P.R. China. I am also a member of the Algorithms and Logic Group in the School of Computer Science and Engineering. I obtained the PhD degree of Computer Science from the University of Angers , France in 2017. My PhD supervisor is Jin-Kao Hao . I got MS and BS degrees both from UESTC in 2010 and 2013, respectively. I am interested in the design and analysis of practical algorithms, i.e., algorithms that work well in practice. Recently, I mainly work on fast algorithms for graph optimization problems. Contact: zhou.yi[at]uestc[dot]edu[dot]cn
docs.title: About Me

I am interested in the design and analysis of practical algorithms, i.e., algorithms that work well in practice. Recently, I mainly work on fast algorithms for graph optimization problems.
